Package com.facebook.buck.rules

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbiRule
    BuildRule that can avoid rebuilding itself when the ABI of its deps has not changed and all properties of the rule other than its deps have not changed.
    AnnotationProcessingData  
    ArtifactCache  
    BinaryBuildRule  
    Buildable
    Represents something that Buck is able to build, encapsulating the logic of how to determine whether the rule needs to be rebuilt and how to actually go about building the rule itself.
    BuildableContext
    Context object that is specific to an individual Buildable.
    BuildableParams
    Parameters that a Buildable often needs to construct itself.
    BuildEngine
    A build engine is responsible for building a given build rule, which includes all its transitive dependencies.
    BuildRule  
    BuildRuleBuilder<T extends BuildRule>  
    BuildRuleFactory<T extends BuildRuleBuilder<?>>
    Implementations should be stateless.
    ConstructorArg
    Marker interface for java objects that acts as arguments to ConstructorArgMarshaller.
    DependencyEnhancer
    Describes the way in which a Buildable will transform its declared dependencies.
    Description<T extends ConstructorArg>
    The Source of Truth about a Buildable, providing mechanisms to expose the arguments that rules derived from the Buildable take and providing a factory for those Buildables.
    ExportDependencies
    BuildRule that can export a subset of it's dependencies.
    FlavorableDescription<T extends ConstructorArg>
    Description that has flavors to register.
    InitializableFromDisk<T>
    Object that has in-memory data structures that need to be populated as a result of executing its steps.
    InstallableApk  
    JavaPackageFinder  
    OnDiskBuildInfo  
    RuleKeyBuilderFactory  
    SourcePath
    Represents a source that is required to build a rule (typically a file).
    TestRule
    A BuildRule that is designed to run tests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBuildable
    No-op implementations of all methods from Buildable.
    AbstractBuildable.AnonymousBuildRule  
    AbstractBuildRule
    Abstract implementation of a BuildRule that can be cached.
    AbstractDependencyVisitor
    Performs a breadth-first traversal of a BuildRule's dependencies.
    ArtifactCacheConnectEvent
    Base class for events about build rules.
    ArtifactCacheConnectEvent.Finished  
    ArtifactCacheConnectEvent.Started  
    ArtifactCacheEvent
    Base class for events about build rules.
    ArtifactCacheEvent.Finished  
    ArtifactCacheEvent.Started  
    BuckPyFunction
    Used to generate a function for use within buck.py for the rule described by a Description.
    BuildableProperties  
    Buildables
    Utility methods for Buildable objects.
    BuildContext  
    BuildContext.Builder  
    Builder  
    BuildEvent
    Base class for events about building.
    BuildEvent.Finished  
    BuildEvent.Started  
    BuildInfoRecorder
    Utility for recording the paths to the output files generated by a build rule, as well as any metadata about those output files.
    BuildOutputInitializer<T>
    Delegates the actual reading of disk-cached data to the InitializableFromDisk and is responsible for safely storing and retrieving the in-memory data structures.
    BuildResult
    This is a union type that represents either a success or a failure.
    BuildRuleBuilderParams  
    BuildRuleEvent
    Base class for events about build rules.
    BuildRuleEvent.Finished  
    BuildRuleEvent.Started  
    BuildRuleFactoryParams
    A set of parameters passed to a BuildRuleFactory.
    BuildRuleParams
    Standard set of parameters that is passed to all build rules.
    BuildRuleResolver
    Provides a mechanism for mapping between a BuildTarget and the BuildRule it represents.
    BuildRules  
    BuildRuleSourcePath
    A SourcePath that utilizes the output from a BuildRule as the file it represents.
    BuildRuleSuccess
    Token provided by the result of BuildEngine.build(BuildContext, BuildRule), demonstrating that the associated BuildRule was built successfully.
    BuildRuleType  
    CachingBuildEngine
    A build engine used to build a BuildRule which also caches the results.
    CassandraArtifactCache  
    CassandraArtifactCache.CassandraConnectionExceptionEvent  
    ConstructorArgMarshaller
    Used to derive information from the constructor args returned by Description instances.
    DefaultBuildableContext  
    DefaultBuildableParams
    Default implementation of BuildableParams.
    DefaultOnDiskBuildInfo
    Utility for reading the metadata associated with a build rule's output.
    DependencyGraph  
    DescribedRule
    A BuildRule that is constructed from a Description.
    DescribedRuleBuilder<T extends ConstructorArg>  
    DescribedRuleFactory<T extends ConstructorArg>
    A factory for DescribedRuleBuilder instances.
    DirArtifactCache  
    IndividualTestEvent  
    IndividualTestEvent.Finished  
    IndividualTestEvent.Started  
    InstallableApk.ExopackageInfo  
    KnownBuildRuleTypes
    A registry of all the build rules types understood by Buck.
    KnownBuildRuleTypes.Builder  
    Label  
    LoggingArtifactCacheDecorator
    Decorator for wrapping a ArtifactCache to log a ArtifactCacheEvent for the start and finish of each event.
    MultiArtifactCache
    MultiArtifactCache encapsulates a set of ArtifactCache instances such that fetch() succeeds if any of the ArtifactCaches contain the desired artifact, and store() applies to all ArtifactCaches.
    NoopArtifactCache  
    PathSourcePath  
    ProjectConfig  
    ProjectConfigDescription  
    ProjectConfigDescription.Arg  
    RecordArtifactsInDirectoryStep
    Not all build rules know the paths of the output files that their steps will generate.
    RecordFileSha1Step  
    RuleKey
    RuleKey encapsulates regimented computation of SHA-1 keys that incorporate all BuildRule state relevant to idempotency.
    RuleKey.Builder  
    RuleKey.Builder.RuleKeyPair  
    Sha1HashCode
    A typesafe representation of a SHA-1 hash.
    SourcePaths
    Utilities for dealing with SourcePaths.
    SourceRoot  
    TestRunEvent  
    TestRunEvent.Finished  
    TestRunEvent.Started

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Hint
    Represents hints given when deal with the value returned by Description.createUnpopulatedConstructorArg().
    TargetName
    Annotates that a ConstructorArg has no 'name' attribute.
